mapper.select: SELECT RANK() OVER(ORDER BY WIN DESC) playerRank, NAME, NICKNAME, TEAM_ID, WIN+LOSE match, WIN, LOSE, WIN/NULLIF((WIN+LOSE),0) * 100 winrate, KILL, DEATH, ASSIST, ROUND((KILL+ASSIST)/NULLIF(DEATH,0),1) kda FROM PLAYER

SELECT P.TEAM_ID||' '||NICKNAME BIRTH, P.PLAYER_ID, P.NAME name, T.NAME teamId, P.NICKNAME nickname, P.WIN WIN, P.LOSE lose, P.KILL kill, P.DEATH death, P.ASSIST assist FROM PLAYER P JOIN TEAM T ON P.TEAM_ID = T.TEAM_ID WHERE P.NICKNAME = #{nickname}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLAYER(PLAYER_ID, NICKNAME, NAME, LINE, TEAM_ID) VALUES(PLAYER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{line}, #{teamId})
mapper.update: UPDATE PLAYER SET WIN = #{win} , LOSE = #{lose} , KILL = #{kill} , DEATH = #{death} , ASSIST = #{assist} WHERE NICKNAME = #{nickname}
